law.catch_line: Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner Program -- Advisory council.

text.section: Any person in this state who holds a credential as a Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner as defined in KRS 314.011(14) shall have the right to use the title "Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner" and the abbreviation "SANE". No other person shall assume the title or use the abbreviation or any other words, letters, signs, or figures to indicate that the person using the same is a Sexual Assault Nurse Examiner.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 50, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 547, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 427, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 145, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 260, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
